info.title: Google Calendar API Methods
info.description: This specification enables interaction with the Google Calendar API, allowing users to create, update, delete events, manage calendars, handle availability, and set permissions.

flows.title: Create Calendar
flows.description: Creates a new secondary calendar.

flows.title: Delete Calendar
flows.description: Deletes a secondary calendar.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar to delete.

flows.title: List Calendars
flows.description: Retrieves the list of calendars available to the user.

success.description: List of calendars the user has access to.

flows.title: Get Calendar Details
flows.description: Retrieves details of a specific calendar.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar to retrieve.

flows.title: Update Calendar Settings
flows.description: Updates settings for a specific calendar.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar to update.

timeZone.description: Updated time zone of the calendar.

flows.title: Create Event
flows.description: Creates a new event in a specified calendar.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar to create an event in.

flows.title: Delete Event
flows.description: Deletes an event from a specified calendar.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar containing the event.

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: ID of the event to delete.

flows.title: Update Event
flows.description: Updates an existing event in a specified calendar.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar containing the event.

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: ID of the event to update.

flows.title: Get Event Details
flows.description: Retrieves details of a specific event from a calendar.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar containing the event.

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: ID of the event to retrieve.

flows.title: List Events in Calendar
flows.description: Retrieves a list of events from a specified calendar.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar to list events from.

success.description: List of events in the specified calendar.

flows.title: Set Event Reminder
flows.description: Adds or updates reminders for a specific event.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar containing the event.

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: ID of the event to set reminders for.

flows.title: Get Event Details
flows.description: Retrieves details of a specific event from a calendar.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar containing the event.

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: ID of the event to retrieve.

flows.title: List Events in Calendar
flows.description: Retrieves a list of events from a specified calendar.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar to list events from.

success.description: List of events in the specified calendar.

flows.title: Set Event Reminder
flows.description: Adds or updates reminders for a specific event.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar containing the event.

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: ID of the event to set reminders for.

flows.title: Get Calendar Settings
flows.description: Retrieves settings for a specified calendar.

flows.title: Set Calendar Permissions
flows.description: Grants or revokes a user's access to a calendar.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar to modify permissions.

role.description: Role assigned to the user (reader, writer, owner).

type.description: Type of scope (user, group, domain, default).

value.description: Email or domain name, if applicable.

flows.title: List Calendar Access Control
flows.description: Retrieves the access control settings for a specified calendar.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar to list ACL settings.

flows.title: Remove User Access
flows.description: Removes a specific user's access to a calendar.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar to remove user access from.

parameters.name: ruleId
parameters.description: ACL rule ID of the user to remove.

flows.title: Add Attendee to Event
flows.description: Adds a new attendee to a specified event.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar containing the event.

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: ID of the event to add an attendee to.

success.description: Updated event details with the added attendee.

flows.title: Remove Attendee from Event
flows.description: Removes a specific attendee from an event.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar containing the event.

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: ID of the event to remove an attendee from.

email.description: Email address of the attendee to remove.

success.description: Updated event details with the attendee removed.

flows.title: Update Attendee Response
flows.description: Updates the response status of an attendee for an event.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar containing the event.

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: ID of the event for which to update attendee response.

flows.title: Check Free/Busy Availability
flows.description: Checks the availability of a calendar for scheduling.

parameters.name: timeMin
parameters.description: Start time for checking availability.

parameters.name: timeMax
parameters.description: End time for checking availability.

parameters.name: items
parameters.description: List of calendars to check availability for.

success.description: Free/Busy information for the requested time range.

flows.title: Set Out-of-Office
flows.description: Blocks time on a calendar to indicate out-of-office.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar.

flows.title: Reserve Meeting Room
flows.description: Books a shared meeting space on a calendar.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar.

flows.title: Enable Event Notifications
flows.description: Sets up notifications for event changes.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar.

id.description: Unique identifier for the notification channel.

flows.title: Subscribe to Calendar Updates
flows.description: Subscribes to calendar updates to receive notifications when changes occur.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar.

flows.title: Unsubscribe from Calendar Updates
flows.description: Stops receiving calendar update notifications.

parameters.name: resourceId
parameters.description: The resource ID of the subscription.

flows.title: Reschedule Event
flows.description: Changes the time of an existing event.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar containing the event.

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: ID of the event to reschedule.

success.description: Updated event details with the new time.

flows.title: Convert Time Zone
flows.description: Converts event times between different time zones.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar containing the event.

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: ID of the event to update time zone.

timeZone.description: New time zone to apply to the event.

success.description: Updated event details with the new time zone.

flows.title: Find Best Meeting Time
flows.description: Suggests the best meeting times based on attendees' availability.

parameters.name: timeMin
parameters.description: Start time for checking availability.

parameters.name: timeMax
parameters.description: End time for checking availability.

parameters.name: attendees
parameters.description: List of attendees for the meeting.

success.description: Suggested best times for the meeting.

flows.title: Import Events
flows.description: Imports external events into Google Calendar.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar to import events into.

flows.title: Export Calendar
flows.description: Exports calendar data in iCal format.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar to export.

flows.title: Migrate Events
flows.description: Migrates events from one calendar to another.

parameters.name: sourceCalendarId
parameters.description: ID of the source calendar.

parameters.name: destinationCalendarId
parameters.description: ID of the destination calendar.

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: ID of the event to migrate.

flows.title: Duplicate Event
flows.description: Clones an existing event to create a new one with the same details.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar containing the event.

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: ID of the event to duplicate.

flows.title: Bulk Delete Events
flows.description: Deletes multiple events from a calendar at once.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar.

eventIds.description: List of event IDs to delete.

flows.title: Bulk Update Events
flows.description: Applies updates to multiple events simultaneously.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar.

eventId.description: ID of the event to update.

updates.description: Fields to update in the event.

flows.title: Update Calendar Settings
flows.description: Modifies calendar settings such as time zone, locale, and visibility.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar to update.

timeZone.description: Updated time zone of the calendar.

flows.title: Set Default Event Duration
flows.description: Defines a default length for new calendar events.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar to configure.

success.description: Confirmation of default event duration setting.

flows.title: Configure Working Hours
flows.description: Sets preferred availability times for scheduling.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar to update working hours.

flows.title: Set Event Reminder
flows.description: Configures reminders for upcoming events.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar.

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: ID of the event to set a reminder for.

minutes.description: Minutes before the event to trigger reminder.

flows.title: Automate Follow-Up Event
flows.description: Automatically schedules a follow-up meeting.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar.

flows.title: Send Reminder Emails
flows.description: Notifies attendees about an upcoming event.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar.

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: ID of the event.

flows.title: Generate Event Summary Report
flows.description: Retrieves a summary of past and upcoming events for analysis.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar to analyze.

parameters.name: timeMin
parameters.description: Start time for fetching events.

parameters.name: timeMax
parameters.description: End time for fetching events.

success.description: List of events within the specified time range.

flows.title: Track Meeting Attendance
flows.description: Logs attendee responses and participation in meetings.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar.

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: ID of the event to track.

success.description: List of attendees and their responses.

flows.title: Analyze Event Trends
flows.description: Identifies patterns in meeting schedules and participation.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar to analyze.

parameters.name: timeMin
parameters.description: Start time for trend analysis.

parameters.name: timeMax
parameters.description: End time for trend analysis.

success.description: Analysis of event trends and participation patterns.

flows.title: Generate Event Summary Report
flows.description: Retrieves a summary of past and upcoming events for analysis.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar to analyze.

parameters.name: timeMin
parameters.description: Start time for fetching events.

parameters.name: timeMax
parameters.description: End time for fetching events.

success.description: List of events within the specified time range.

flows.title: Track Meeting Attendance
flows.description: Logs attendee responses and participation in meetings.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar.

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: ID of the event to track.

success.description: List of attendees and their responses.

flows.title: Analyze Event Trends
flows.description: Identifies patterns in meeting schedules and participation.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar to analyze.

parameters.name: timeMin
parameters.description: Start time for trend analysis.

parameters.name: timeMax
parameters.description: End time for trend analysis.

success.description: Analysis of event trends and participation patterns.

flows.title: Manage Calendar Delegation
flows.description: Grants or removes delegate access to a calendar.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar to modify.

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: Access role to assign (reader, writer, owner).

parameters.name: userEmail
parameters.description: Email of the user to delegate access to.

flows.title: Batch Event Processing
flows.description: Processes multiple event operations in a single request.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar to modify events in.

eventData.description: Event details for creation or update.

parameters.description: ID of the calendar to export.

success.description: Download link for the exported iCal file.

flows.description: Uses AI to draft an agenda based on event details.

parameters.description: ID of the calendar.

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: ID of the event.

flows.description: Automatically labels events based on patterns and topics.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar.

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: ID of the event.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: ID of the calendar.

parameters.name: attendeeEmails
parameters.description: List of attendee emails.
